text:
The joys of motherhood! Khloé Kardashian loves her new role as a mom to daughter True Thompson, a source tells Us Weekly exclusively.

“Khloé is absolutely obsessed with True, and is up with the baby in the middle of the night whenever she cries,” the source explains. “Khloe does have a nanny, but she is hardly working because Khloe is so hands-on.”

The insider adds that the 33-year-old reality star has been “very emotional because she didn’t ever think she would become a mother, and considers True to be a miracle.”

As Us Weekly previously reported, Kardashian gave birth to her first child with Tristan Thompson at a hospital in Cleveland on April 12. Four days later, the Revenge Body host announced her daughter’s name and revealed her baby girl weighed 6 pounds, 13 ounces at birth.

“Our little girl, True Thompson, has completely stolen our hearts and we are overwhelmed with LOVE,” Kardashian captioned a photo of pink decorations on Monday, April 16. “Such a blessing to welcome this angel into the family! Mommy and Daddy loooooove you True!”

The Keeping Up With the Kardashians star has opened up in the past about her desire to start a family. “Being pregnant has always been a dream of mine,” she tweeted back in March. “Even though 9 months feels like a lifetime while I’m awaiting the arrival of my baby girl, it’s really a blink in the grand scheme of life.”

Two days before Kardashian and Thompson welcomed baby True, footage emerged of the Cleveland Cavaliers star appearing to kiss and go to a hotel with another woman. Us Weekly confirmed on Friday, April 13, that the basketball pro has been unfaithful with multiple women since at least November.

Members of the Kardashian family have yet to publicly comment on the cheating scandal.
title: Khloe Kardashian Is ‘Hands-On’ With Baby True
